name: jorisw-mongodb
author: Joris van der Wel <joris@jorisvanderwel.com>
summary: Configures the mongodb 3 service. Installed from repo.mongodb.org. Any config setting can be configured using your puppet manifest and/or using hiera.
description: Configures the mongodb 3 service. Installed from repo.mongodb.org. Any config setting can be configured using your puppet manifest and/or using hiera.
